name: Babal
description:
Babal is a bouncing ball game, an endless runner in a futurist space tunnel. Steer left, steer right, and jump around to avoid obstacles. This is all it takes to have fun with this fast-paced casual game.

As this is still an alpha version, I would be so happy to have feedback on the game, what is great, what is broken, and what is neither of those but worth saying. Enjoy !
